attributes.action: Mayor - Declare London independent from the UK and apply to join the EU.
attributes.background: After Brexit referendum got 51.9% vote and UK will be out of EU. I would like to request to mayor of London and Perliament to declare London as Independent and join the EU. $2tn has been wiped out from global market in one day. Londoner's didn't voted for Brexit and majority vote is for EU remain.

rejection.details: This petition is addressed to the Mayor of London. The UK Government and Parliament Petitions website can only be used for petitions that are addressed to central government or Parliament.
